name: Bobbed Deuce Truck Turbulence
description:
This is an unforgiving competition where only the strongest and the most skilled survive. Join the arena and drive your Bobbed Deuce Truck crushing all the others and destroying their cars, before they get the into them to destroy yours.
* Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Animations And Physics
